info: This file contains all splash texts - to submit your own splash texts please follow this guide: https://github.com/Sv443/JokeAPI/blob/master/.github/Contributing.md#submitting-translations

splashes.en: Smuggling jokes through the TCP border patrol since 2018
splashes.de: Wir schmuggeln Witze durch die TCP Grenzpatrouille seit 2018
splashes.ru: Контрабандные шутки через пограничный патруль "TCP" с 2018 года

splashes.en: A horse walks into a bar...
splashes.de: Kommt ein Pferd in die Bar...

splashes.en: If you're reading this, you've been hax!
